DOC.brief_title: Gut Microbiome Mediated Effects Inulin Supplementation Mineral Bone Metabolism Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: In randomize control cross-over study , twenty HD patient ( 10 male/10 female , age 20-80 ) recruit local dialysis clinic Champaign-Urbana , IL . After baseline testing , patient randomize intervention group placebo group ( maltodextrin ) . Patients consume inulin ( females 10g/day , male 15g/day ) maltodextrin ( females 10g/day , male 15g/day ) one month , rest two week ( washout period ) , continue treatment ( either inulin maltodextrin ) another month . Outcomes assessed beginning period month supplementation period .
DOC.criteria: Receive HD therapy 3 day per week least 3 month Sustained hypercalcemia ( > 3months ) . Previous major gastrointestinal disease diagnosis ( e.g. , inflammatory bowel disease celiac disease ) . Antibiotic treatment < 2 week prior start study .
